name: Mark Merged PRs as Read
description: Marks all completed, unread sessions with a merged PR as read.

name: Open Draft/Open PRs
description: Opens the PR in the browser for all unread sessions with a draft or open PR.

name: Archive Stale Sessions
description: Hides all sessions that haven't been updated in over 90 days.

name: Refresh Watched Sessions
description: Refreshes all sessions that you are currently watching.
